name: Mimic Hold
statusOutcome: Â¡Mientras abre el cofre, dos brazos grandes y carnosos salen del interior y te agarras!
restraintStruggle: [TargetName] tries to pull free of the myriad of unnaturally pale hands holding [TargetHimOrHer] in place...
restraintStruggleCharmed: [TargetName] weakly tries to pull free of the myriad of unnaturally pale hands holding [TargetHimOrHer] in place...
restraintEscaped: [TargetName] manages to shake off [AttackerName]'s many-armed hold and stumbles away from the eerie treasure chest monster while she lets out a longing sigh.
restraintEscapedFail: Despite [TargetName]'s best efforts, [AttackerName]'s countless unearthly hands keep a firm hold on [TargetHisOrHer] body, keeping [TargetHimOrHer] at the mimic's sweet mercy.
